buttons.name: tue_next
buttons.style:
font-family: 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;
font-weight: bold;

text.en: Welcome back to SPKY4! THE ULTIMATE in SpookyTown News.
If you're just joining us, we are looking at an aerial view of Downtown as we await the mayor to give his annual address!
Any minute now we'll see the biggest event of our year, and we've been told that The Mayor has HUGE news regarding Halloween!
Get pumped dear viewer! I know I am. We should be cutting to the address any minute now...
As the clock tics I can't help but wonder... WHERE IS THE MAYOR?
Hello? Jesus finally... right... Ahem. Ladies and gentleman The Mayor is finally ready! Lets cut down to the ground to get in on the excitement!
I know you're all excited for the biggest moment of the year. Celebrating Halloween has been our most time honored tradition.
WHICH IS WHY THIS YEAR YOU'RE GOING TO WISH IT NEVER WAS
For years we have watched these humans through static
We thought they were so cute... In some cases so... cool...
And we were flattered by Halloween... They dressed like us. So cute. But how could we be so blind?
Through the static of our interdimensional television screens we forgot a fundamental truth
They may be cute and cool. They may seem friendly. But we cannot visit their world. Why?
Hatred and fear. They would kill us should we step foot through the portal into their realm.
That is why this year I am officially BANNING the celebration of Halloween.
